description.narrative:
The SLHAP was developed early 2015 through a combined effort from Oxfam affiliates including Novib, Intermon, America, and GB, and is now being implemented in ten countries. In addition in 2016 this will also be implemented in Iraq. Local humanitarian actors (LHAs - comprised of both LNGOs and local government actors) in Iraq and the KRI rarely receive direct funding from donors, and when they do, usually have little space to claim in the broader humanitarian community in order to voice their agenda andare seen as servicedelivery contractors.
The general objective is to promote strong and empowered local/national humanitarian actors (LHAs) to lead and manage the humanitarian response.
Specific objectives of the SLHAP in Iraq are: 1) assess the humanitarian country capacity, and 2) promote local humanitarian leadership agenda in the current humanitarian response.
Methodology and steps to be taken are: 1. Fresh Analysis: an assessment of both central Iraq and Kurdistan Regional government, in addition to the local NGOs registered in bothentities. The assessments will tentatively take place in five different provinces: Dohuk, Erbil, Kirkuk, Diyala (Khanaqin), and Baghdad. 2. Fresh Analysis Report: will provide a comprehensive snapshot of the LHA s capacity and proposed objectives towards increased country capacity and recommendations. 3.Validation of findings: validation of findings with stakeholders, finalizing the report for publication, creating space for LHAs to reflect on potential synergies and future actions. 4. Action plan and implementation: LHAs to develop a local leadership agenda and an action plan to promote that agenda.

participating-org.narrative: Oxfam Great Britain is a member of Oxfam International, a confederation of independent national organisations working in more than 90 countries. Oxfam works on six goals that support the shared vision of a just world without poverty: help people claim their right to a better life; champion equal rights for women; saving lives, now and in the future; safeguard global food supplies; help people claim a fairer share of natural resources; and increase money for basic services. For 70 years, Oxfam has been running emergency responses, development projects and campaigning at the grass roots level to tackle poverty.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to life and security

description.narrative: Strengthened CSOs: # CSOs increasing that participate or initiate influencing for space in humanitarian work and that are capable of effective humanitarian response according to humanitarian standards.
